channel.title: Keep a user sign-in session alive with a refresh token on Hugo Techdoc Theme
channel.description: Recent content in Keep a user sign-in session alive with a refresh token on Hugo Techdoc Theme

item.title: Overview and configuration
item.description: Overview and configuration In Phase 1?: “Yes, but for phase 1 keep changes to existing doc as minimal as possible” In Phase 2?: TBD Related to help docs?: No, targetted towards developers Content Notes New or existing doc?: Existing doc: changes needed Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: - Update title Pull overview and configuration from the existing doc into this doc Links to original docs: - Refresh access tokens: https://developer.

item.title: How to implement in your app
item.description: How to implement in your app In Phase 1?: “Yes, since it’s a new doc pulling from existing content” In Phase 2?: TBD Related to help docs?: No, targetted towards developers Content Notes New or existing doc?: New doc with new content but also pulling from existing content Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Dimensioned by: Language Changes to be made: Pull the content from both existing docs describing how to implement in your app into this doc
